title: Workers at Trader Joe’s in Brooklyn Reject Union
description: The loss raises questions about whether a national wave of unionization may be slowing. A union had won two previous votes at the grocery chain.
dc:creator: Noam Scheiber
media:credit: Gabby Jones for The New York Times
media:description: Trader Joe’s independent union, Trade Joe’s United, faced its first loss at the company at a location in Brooklyn.
